title: Why can I no longer find a gas pump with a \'latch\' to keep the pump running?  Every one I go to, you now have to keep holding the hose the whole time.  Bummer, I have an SUV and it takes a long time to pump. It\'s also hard on my elderly father. And really unpleasant in this cold weather! Can you find any with latches?
